extensionDescription.message: Drag and drop selected text to search or open links in a new tab

enableTextSearch.message: Drag and drop selected text to search

searchUrlDescription.message: Substitute search keyword in address with %s or %S

enableLinkOpen.message: Drag and drop link to open in a new tab

enableLinkTextSelect.message: Drag link text horizontally to select

selectLikeOpera.message: Select link text like Presto Opera
